name: Klinklang

passive.name: Clockwork
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may search your deck for a Metal Energy, reveal it to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

attacks.name: Smoke and Industry
attacks.effect: This attack deals 10 less damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokemon.

flavor: This Pokemon grinds smaller ones to dust between its irrevocably interlinked gears. If the gears ever separate, this Pokemon dies.
